document_data.mainbody:
Muriel was a monk at the Monastery of the Yellow Rose.
In 1491 DR, Muriel and some other monks were kidnapped by cultists of the Cult of the Howling Hatred, who planned to use them in a new plot to access an elemental node. In a room of the nodes complex under the monastery, she met an adventuring party hired by Grandmaster Perrywinkle Shin to find the missing monks. The adventurers saved her from poison gas.
